loadingDataError: An error occurred while loading data. Check the server.
emptyArchive: There are no videos in your archive yet.
selectVideoToEdit: Please select a video to edit.
missingInfoDescription: Videos for which automatic information could not be found are listed below. Last scan: {lastScan}. You can select one and fill in the missing fields.
settingsDescription: You can manage torrent search and subtitle support from your local preferences.
settingsTorrentSearchDescription: Track downloads by searching YTS/Apibay results.
settingsSubtitlesDescription: Show local subtitle files in the player.
legalConsentIntro: homeVideoDB only lists local video files on your device; it does not host or distribute content from external servers, nor does it offer a pirated archive.
legalConsentUserInitiative: Torrent search and download shortcuts in the application are entirely at the user's initiative. These links redirect to third-party indexes (e.g., YTS, Apibay), and the user is responsible for the download.
legalConsentResponsibilityLi1: It is solely your responsibility to ensure the legal rights of the content you download or share.
legalConsentResponsibilityLi2: Developers cannot be held responsible for damages arising from your use, legal risks, or third-party content.
legalConsentResponsibilityLi3: This text is not legal advice; legislation varies by country (e.g., FSEK, DMCA). You should seek expert advice when necessary.
legalConsentCommitmentLi1: You will only download content that is public domain, openly licensed, or authorized by the rights holder.
legalConsentCommitmentLi2: You will limit torrent searches to content explicitly permitted by license.
legalConsentCommitmentLi3: You will verify the accuracy and legal status of third-party search results yourself.
legalConsentCommitmentLi4: You accept that all legal responsibility rests with you.
legalConsentWarning: If you do not accept these terms, you should not use the application and should keep all online features, including torrent search, disabled.
